entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Port Alberni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:45 p.m. PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. 60 percent chance of showers near Gold River late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
